title: Lunchbox Gets His Day In Court + Drunk Trivia + Amy's Son Has A Girlfriend
itunes:title: Lunchbox Gets His Day In Court + Drunk Trivia + Amy's Son Has A Girlfriend
description:
Lunchbox goes to court to contest a speeding ticket. Show members place their 'Drunk Trivia' bets. Amy finds out about her son's new girlfriend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
